content: ©2007 asparagus & mayonnaise asparagusmayonnaise blogspot com fancy star snowflake materials this can be made with larger yarn and a larger hook or with finer thread and a smaller hook the snowflake pictured was created with size 10 crochet cotton size 6 us steel hook sewing needle eye just large enough for crochet cotton stiffener a good overview of stiffeners can be found at http //crochet tangleweeds com/stiffeners html directions stitch guide treble_crochet decrease yo twice insert hook in st indicated yo and pull up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops on hook twice * yo twice insert hook in next stitch nd pull up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops on hook twice repeat from * once more yo and draw through all four loops on hook __________________ chain 5 join with slip st to form a ring round 1 chain 6 counts as first double_crochet plus chain 3 double_crochet in ring chain 3 5 times join with slip_stitch to third chain of chain-6 6 double_crochet and 6 chain-3 sps round 2 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 5 double_crochet in same chain-3 space double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 5 double_crochet in same chain- 3 space 5 times join with slip_stitch to first double_crochet round 3 chain 4 counts as first treble_crochet now and throughout treble_crochet in next double_crochet chain 4 single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 4 treble_crochet in next double_crochet treble_crochet in next 2 double_crochet chain 4 single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 4 treble_crochet in next double_crochet 5 times join with slip_stitch to first double_crochet ©2007 asparagus & mayonnaise asparagusmayonnaise blogspot com round 4 chain 4 treble_crochet in next double_crochet chain 7 single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 7 treble_crochet in next double_crochet treble_crochet in next 2 double_crochet chain 7 single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 7 treble_crochet in next double_crochet 5 times join with slip_stitch to first double_crochet round 5 slip_stitch in stitch to right chain 4 * yo twice insert hook in next stitch and pull up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops on hook twice repeat from * once more yo and draw through all three loops on hook chain 9 single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 9 work treble_crochet decrease in next treble_crochet chain 9 single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 9 around join with slip_stitch to top of first st round 6 chain 1 single_crochet in same st chain 6 single_crochet in same st * chain 9 single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 6 single_crochet in same st chain 9 single_crochet in top of next treble_crochet decrease chain 6 single_crochet in same st repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to first st fasten_off and weave in ends using sewing needle block and stiffen using a six-point blocking pattern
